LanguageData.fueled_ASRG.label: fueled ASRG
LanguageData.fueled_ASRG.description: Building Advanced Stirling Radioisotope Generator is surely the way to go when it comes to power. Quite efficient energy generation, but eventually the uranium will deplete, so a constant replenishment of the uranium casket is required.
LanguageData.large_fueled_ASRG.label: large fueled ASRG
LanguageData.large_fueled_ASRG.description: Build large Advanced Stirling Radioisotope Generator for higher supply of power.
LanguageData.advanced_nofuel_geothermal_generator.des: Build advanced geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted higher power.
LanguageData.advanced_fueled_nuclear_generator.label: adv. nuclear power
LanguageData.advanced_fueled_nuclear_generator.descri: Build advanced nuclear generators and that provide the highest supply of power.
